mapper.select: SELECT REC_A_POST_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, REC_A_ID, REC_A_IMG_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_A_KEYWORD_ID, REC_A_TITLE, REC_A_CONTENT, REC_A_DATE_CREATED, REC_A_VIEW_CNT, REC_A_LIKE_CNT, REC_A_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM REC_ACTIVITY_INFO ORDER BY REC_A_POST_ID LIMIT #{perPagePostCount} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT REC_A_POST_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, REC_A_ID, REC_A_IMG_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_A_KEYWORD_ID, REC_A_TITLE, REC_A_CONTENT, REC_A_DATE_CREATED, REC_A_VIEW_CNT, REC_A_LIKE_CNT, REC_A_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM REC_ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE REC_A_DATE_CREATED BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') ORDER BY REC_A_POST_ID LIMIT #{perPagePostCount} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT REC_A_POST_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, REC_A_ID, REC_A_IMG_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_A_KEYWORD_ID, REC_A_TITLE, REC_A_DATE_CREATED, REC_A_VIEW_CNT, REC_A_LIKE_CNT, REC_A_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM REC_ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE REC_A_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchDTO.keyword}, '%') ORDER BY REC_A_POST_ID LIMIT #{perPagePostCount} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT A.REC_A_POST_ID, A.SIGUNGU_ID, A.REC_A_ID, A.REC_A_IMG_ID, A.POST_TYPE_ID, A.REC_A_KEYWORD_ID, A.REC_A_TITLE, A.REC_A_DATE_CREATED, A.REC_A_VIEW_CNT, A.REC_A_LIKE_CNT, A.REC_A_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM REC_ACTIVITY_INFO A INNER JOIN REC_IMAGES I ON A.REC_A_IMG_ID = I.REC_A_IMG_ID WHERE A.REC_A_POST_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REC_ACTIVITY_INFO VALUES (NULL, #{sigunguId}, NULL, #{recAImgId}, #{postTypeId}, #{recAKeywordId}, #{recATitle}, #{recAContent}, STR_TO_DATE(#{recADateCreated}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{recAViewCnt}, #{recALikeCnt}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT B.REC_A_IMG_ID FROM REC_ACTIVITY_INFO A, REC_IMAGES B WHERE A.REC_A_IMG_ID = B.REC_A_IMG_ID AND A.REC_A_POST_ID = #{recAPostId}
mapper.update: UPDATE REC_ACTIVITY_INFO SET SIGUNGU_ID = #{aRActivity.sigunguId}, REC_A_ID = #{aRActivity.recAId}, REC_A_KEYWORD_ID = #{aRActivity.recAKeywordId}, REC_A_TITLE = #{aRActivity.recATitle}, REC_A_CONTENT = #{aRActivity.recAContent}, REC_A_DATE_CREATED = STR_TO_DATE(#{aRActivity.recADateCreated}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE REC_A_POST_ID = #{aRActivity.recAPostId}
